name: Tower Dwellers: Royal Defense
description:
Here it comes! New Tower Dwellers: Royal Defense is huge fun with its original gameplay style, but in the completely new world of the Orient. Arm yourself, fight, and regain your land!

-Build towers, craft new units, and choose new Heroes!
-Defeat an army of various enemies in real time!
-Defend your land battling in different locations and using a bunch of upgrades!
-Fight with swordsmen, archers, mages, and… pyrotechnists!
-Play in normal or hard mode, or take up the challenge and beat nightmare mode!
